text:
My life's purpose is
to reflect the values

that my parents instilled in
me in my future generations.

What matters the most
to me is my family.

Every single day,
I'm thankful that I

was born to parents who brought
me up with such great values,

and love, and made
huge sacrifices so I

can have a better, and
a comfortable, life.

I will live every single
day taking care of them

and put in a conscious effort
to spend as much time with them

I know I can never do as
much as they did for me,

but I've promised myself
that their grandchildren will

grow up echoing the values
that they instilled in me.
